pros:
-Great team experience. Have plenty of time to talk with founder
-Fantastic internship for students studying abroad
-Exciting projects
cons: -As an intern, you won't have many responsibilities initially. The team is eager to let you take on more as you express interest, so take the initiative

pros: Flexible work schedule, possibility to work from home
cons: The company is very badly managed

review_title: Doing good work, but marketing interns don't learn much
pros: Flexible schedule, allowed to work remote with an organization doing meaningful work
cons: No guidance or growth or structure; didn't learn much

review_title: Useful experience but not very inclusive
pros: Flexible work schedule and interesting workload.
cons: Not many employees would talk to interns, was quite isolating. Internship unpaid.

review_title: It is a great organisation who wants to grasp experience in journalism.
pros: Nice management, very flexible working hours.
